name: Bouncy Bits
description:
HARDEST GAME IN THE UNIVERSE!! SINCE THAT BIRD THAT FLAPPED!

Welcome to the world of Bouncy Bits where you can enjoy the freedom to Bounce your Bits!

Test your skill, patience and determination to unlock a whole world of characters from the bouncy world. Rainbow sheep, chip stealing seagulls, and piranha's with a taste for toes.

Collect coins, open up secret bit boxes, and you to can be the envy of your friends when you finally unleash Penelope the Pony! Spreading magic, sparkles and glitter to brighten up your day.

- 80+ Bouncy Bits to unlock!
- Super Hard!
- 6+ environments!
- Supports 13 Languages

PLEASE NOTE

Bouncy Bits is completely free to play. However, some items can be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your devices settings.

Bouncy Bits was developed by PlaySide, the developers behind Editors' Choice title "Catch The Ark", Spongebob : Sponge on the Run and Boulder Jack.

Let us know what you would love to see in our next update at : www.playsidestudios.com
